name: SAMHAIN (SoHoGames)
description:
It is the middle of the night on the eve of Halloween. Your dad wakes you and says "we gotta go for a drive." It is a long drive and you fall asleep in the back seat of the car. You are sleeping until a crash of thunder disturbs you, and you realize that the car is parked and you are alone in it. Outside, you can see a forest of trees, a chain-link fence, and a huge, lumbering house. The nightmare has begun.

Consider supporting me on Patreon for instant access to the next stage of the demo. (WIP)
